comment.author: 34811095@N05
comment._content: I love this picture. There is just something about classic photos that has such an elegance...And leaves me green with envy that I didn't live during that era. People had so much more class at that time!!

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called THE WINDOW FRAME, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: Thanks for all your comments. I think that all the Mary Dillwyn photographs tell a story somehow. Her images always make you want to know more about the individuals. For example, I'd love to know that they were discussing in this image? Do you agree?
